alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parkland, or near Coral Springs, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Deerfield Beach, Tamarac, Margate, Coconut Creek, North Lauderdale, Parkland, Mission Bay, Boca Pointe, Godfrey Road, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Whisper Walk, Boca Del Mar, Loxahatchee NWR, Hillsboro Ranches, North Pompano Beach, Hillsboro Pines, Ramblewood East and South County Regional Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
